topic.title: Trying not to be pathetic but everything is worsening
topic.body:
Okay so LITERALLY everyone I know is concerned about what is gonna happen next. Rumors are getting crazier and the near future we expected is turning into a new degree of dystopian mess every day...

As I said I tried not to be THAT pathetic, so is there any chance this situation is getting (or will get) better? What do you guys think?

2_15Q5U52Aqgjb66GkzhkGKDYgWsqR8TEkJG.body: Seems like this life is getting harder... Tech at its worst usage.
